episodes.title: Mr. Garrison's Fancy New Vagina
episodes.plot: Mr. Garrison gets an operation and becomes a woman; Kyle gets surgery to become tall and black so he can play basketball; Gerald decides he wants to be a dolphin.

episodes.title: Die Hippie, Die
episodes.plot: Cartman leads the resistance when a mass of hippies accumulates in South Park and starts a music festival.

episodes.title: Wing
episodes.plot: The boys start a talent agency and represent a woman named Wing in Hollywood.

episodes.title: Best Friends Forever
episodes.plot: Can Cartman and Kenny stay as "Best Friends Forever", even when Kenny buys the last PSP in stock?

episodes.title: The Losing Edge
episodes.plot: The boys enlist Kyle's cousin to help them lose in baseball so they won't have to go to the finals. Meanwhile, Randy trains to fight other parents during Stan's games.

episodes.title: The Death of Eric Cartman
episodes.plot: When the boys decide to ignore Cartman, he assumes that he is dead, and enlists Butters to help him make up for his past sins.

episodes.title: Erection Day
episodes.plot: Jimmy gets his first erection just days before the school talent show.

episodes.title: Two Days Before the Day After Tomorrow
episodes.plot: When a dam breaks and floods a nearby town, South Park residents assume it was caused by global warming and barricade themselves in the community center.

episodes.title: Marjorine
episodes.plot: Butters fakes his own death and disguises himself as a girl so he can infiltrate a sleepover and steal a fortune telling device from the girls. Meanwhile, Butters' father turns to the occult to bring back his son.

episodes.title: Follow That Egg
episodes.plot: Ms Garrison realises she still has feelings for Mr Slave. But Mr Slave has moved on and plans to marry his new boyfriend, Big Gay Al as soon as the Governor signs the same sex marriage bill.

episodes.title: Ginger Kids
episodes.plot: Cartman leads a vendetta against kids with red hair and freckles, until a prank makes him think he is one of them.

episodes.title: Trapped in the Closet
episodes.plot: Several religious leaders recongize Stan as the second coming of L. Ron Hubbard, and a whole soap opera unfolds with the help from a famous R&B sensation.

episodes.title: Free Willzyx
episodes.plot: When a prank convinces the boys that a whale in a local aquarium is an alien from the moon, they go to extreme measures to send it home.

episodes.title: Bloody Mary
episodes.plot: Randy is forced to go to AA meetings, where he becomes convinced that he has a disease. Desperate, he and Stan go on a pilgrimage to a statue of the virgin Mary that is miraculously bleeding from its ass.
